meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive D.J. Perry Claudia Gray John Baker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6390.

div.div: Clip of this game shown in the eleventh Season 1 episode of House of Cards.

td.p: D.J. Perry, a burrito architect from Houston, Texas
Claudia Gray, a substitute teacher from Monrovia, California
John Baker, a home inspector from Dixon, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,300)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN SLOGANS
DAY SONGS
ALSO A BIRD
PENINSULAS
CUTS LIKE A KNIFE
AN "R_____T" CATEGORY
(Alex: Responses will begin with the letter "R" and end with the letter "T".)

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '1864:
"Don\'t swap horses in the middle of the stream"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
1864:
"Don't swap horses in the middle of the stream"

Roosevelt

JohnD.J.
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
